thread.title: Czech Social Democrats agree to restart talks on forming government - source

title: Czech Social Democrats agree to restart talks on forming government - source
text:
April 20, 2018 / 3:46 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago Czech Social Democrats agree to restart talks on forming government - source Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
PRAGUE (Reuters) - Leaders from the centre-left Czech Social Democratic Party agreed on Friday to return to talks with Prime Minister Andrej Babisâ€™s ANO party on forming a new government, a Social Democrat source at the meeting said. FILE PHOTO: Czech Prime Minister Andrej Babis arrives at a news conference at government headquarters in Prague, Czech Republic, March 26, 2018. REUTERS/David W Cerny 
Babis has been trying to find coalition partners since his one-party minority cabinet lost a confidence vote in January. 
The Social Democrats walked away from earlier talks with Babis. Reporting by Robert Muller; Writing by Jan Lopatka
